name: InterContinental Miramar Panama

reviews.text: I spent 6 nights here whilst attending a conference in the city. There were a number of "preferred" hotels that the organisers recommended including the Hard Rock and the Radisson but I am convinced this was the best choice. The room was an excellent size, clean, comfortable with good amenities (although a walk-in shower would have been preferable to one in the bath). Wi-Fi in the room has to be paid for but I either used the free Wi-Fi in the lobby/bar or at the conference centre itself. Breakfast was good (with lots of fresh fruit) although the dining room did get very full at certain times. Situated between the financial district and the old town the location is spot-on and taxis are cheap if you don't want to walk. But above all else the view from my 14th floor room, both at night and during the day, was just superb.
reviews.title: Amazing views in a great location

reviews.text: top location, loved the sea view from my room and my morning runs on the cinta costiera...
reviews.title: loved the sea view

reviews.text: big room and bathroom, nice staff, will definitely visit again. probably a bit noisy so try to get a high floor room (16+)
reviews.title: Excellent location & Services for Panama

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Staff was very helpful, the restaurant & room service was great. The breakfast & Lunch buffet is to die for, along with the view, ambiance and live piano music is the icing on the cake. Also has a great pool & Gym with all sorts of cardio classes through out the day along with the spa for sauna and massages. Used the travel agents located in the hotel to book a tour of the Panama canal and the rain forest along with a ride on the zip lines, which turned out to be a lot of fun! In short a full 5 star hotel with all the services you can ask for.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay in Panama City

reviews.text: We were pleased with our stay at this hotel. The water side views are great from the floor to ceiling windows in the rooms. The décor is non-cluttered, clean, and modern. Staff are very friendly and helpful. The waterfront park and walkway is impressive and easily accessible from the hotel. The pool is large and relaxing in the middle of a bustling downtown. The beds are comfortable. I would stay at this hotel again or recommend it to a friend.
reviews.title: Lovely stay

description: InterContinental Miramar Panama epitomizes the capital's cosmopolitan style with a striking tower in the financial district. Views of the Pacific Ocean showcase vessels coming through the Panama Canal, which is only eight kilometres (five miles) away. The main shopping malls, Atlapa Convention Centre and Casco Viejo (the old city) are within close reach.
